item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.0.3
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.15.0.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 01 Jun 2022 13:33:40 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.15.0]
- First release *inheriting* from the Instrument Framework (v1.11.3.2) (Issue #41)!
- Issue #52: Add support for a mix of real devices (with multiple chassis) and simulated devices (or both)
- Issue #53: UI updates
- Issue #55: fix spelling errors
- Issue #56: fixes related to sweep API
- Issue #58: fix sweep control enable/disable
- Issue #59: change sweep control channel ring to numeric
- Issue #60: Remove redundant sampling controls
- Fix issue with ADC/DAC filter delay

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013 (32 bit / x86)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Asylum AFM API v1.0.0.5
item.description:
Product: Asylum AFM API v1.0.0.5
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 01 Jun 2022 08:43:07 -0400
Packager: Joseph Albro

Description: This is a LabVIEW wrapper meant to facilitate the use of the text based Asylum Instruments ActiveX API. These are the lowest level commands. Please note that these commands may be out of date. This package will need to be updated as time goes on and new functionality is needed.

Release Notes: Added additonal check in the EnsureIgorFormatting
Now handles empty strings (test added), " to ""
